assessments.status_rationale: No CPI release has occurred yet; the deadline (mid-November) has not been reached and today's news offers no confirmed CPI print.

CNBC reports the October Employment Situation report was missed due to the shutdown, so no U-3 rate printed on the due date. Resolution depends on how to treat a delayed release versus the stated due date.
No evidence in today’s coverage of any weekly initial claims reading ≥245,000; the window remains open through 2025-11-30.
The performance window (2025-11-06 to 2025-11-30) is in progress; while tech had a weak week, no confirmed relative return spread of -5pp is established yet.
Articles mention cancellations but do not cite FlightAware metrics showing ≥20% delays at EWR, LGA, or JFK; the deadline is 2025-11-15.
No report of new Federal Reserve enforcement actions appeared in today’s news; the window runs through 2025-11-30.
No mention of the 5y5y inflation expectation hitting ≤2.20%; still within the observation window.
No coverage indicates RBOB front-month settled ≤$2.10/gal; deadline remains 2025-11-30.
No EIA storage report in the news shows a ≥5 Bcf withdrawal; the period is still open.
News references possible changes to Russian oil sanctions and Hungary but nothing on new Venezuela-related OFAC designations.
No Meta newsroom or policy update today announcing enhanced advertiser verification/disclosure targeting scam/fraud ads.
Despite equity volatility headlines, no evidence VXN closed ≥28 on any day so far within the window.
